function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close collaboration and physical interaction between municipal staff, researchers, and project partners may increase the risk of contagious disease spread.","Impact":"Potential outbreak of contagious diseases among project participants, leading to illness and project disruption.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, including regular testing, temperature checks, and sanitation measures. Limit in-person interactions and prioritize virtual collaboration where possible.","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, remote collaboration tools, and video conferencing software.","People":"Municipal staff, researchers, project partners.","Owner":"Project organizers, health and safety authorities."}]}
